𓋊 ≈ 𓋉 ≈ 𒁵 MUN amen ≈ Erbamen "goodness, kindness" good deeds!

𓇋𓏠𓈖
1. Amen: ('so be it' etc) 𓇋 𓏠 𓈖 Right ! 2. Amun: Main god of the Egyptians
3. À Men: 𓋊 Menes being the founding father of the children of Khmen

I am mine

𒃶 KÁM 𒃶𒀀𒀭 he₂am₃ amen he'am "so be it!" 𒃶 GAN gene 𓃹 sein sei! 𒃶𒀀 he₂a hé "he be; be he; be it" 𒃶 GAN 𓏠𓈖 gene gyne bear young; child-bearing
